languages.text: "Меня будоражит лишь один вопрос: нужен ли тебе язык, чтобы служить Домин?"
"What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"
languages.original_text: "Меня будоражит лишь один вопрос: нужен ли тебе язык, чтобы служить Домин?"

traits.locale_text: "What stimulates me is this question: can you still serve the Domin without your tongue?"
"What stimulates me is this question: can you still serve the Domin without your tongue?"
"What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"
"What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"
"What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"
"What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"
"What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"

languages.text: "Was mich stimuliert, ist folgende Frage: Könntet Ihr {mf|dem|der} Domin noch immer dienen, wenn Ihr keine Zunge hättet?"
languages.original_text: "What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"

traits.locale_text: "Was mich stimuliert, ist folgende Frage: Könntet Ihr {mf|dem|der} Domin noch immer dienen, wenn Ihr keine Zunge hättet?"

languages.text: « Ce qui me taquine, c'est la question suivante : pourriez-vous encore servir {mf|le|la} Domin si d'aventure on vous arrachait la langue ? »
languages.original_text: "What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"

traits.locale_text: « Ce qui me taquine, c'est la question suivante : pourriez-vous encore servir {mf|le|la} Domin si d'aventure on vous arrachait la langue ? »

languages.text: «Lo que me estimula es esta pregunta: ¿podrías seguir sirviendo a mi Domin si no tuvieras lengua?».
languages.original_text: "What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"

traits.locale_text: «Lo que me estimula es esta pregunta: ¿podrías seguir sirviendo a mi Domin si no tuvieras lengua?».

languages.text: 「この質問には興味がある：もしお前に舌がなかったら、それでもドミンに仕えたいと思うか？」
languages.original_text: "What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"

traits.locale_text: 「この質問には興味がある：もしお前に舌がなかったら、それでもドミンに仕えたいと思うか？」

languages.text: “让我欣悦不已的是这个问题——要是你没了舌头，你还能侍奉秘者吗？”
languages.original_text: "What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"

traits.locale_text: “让我欣悦不已的是这个问题——要是你没了舌头，你还能侍奉秘者吗？”

languages.original_text: "What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"

languages.text: "İster istemez aklıma şu soru geliyor: Dilin olmadan Domin'e hizmet etmeyi sürdürebilir misin?"
languages.original_text: "What stimulates me is this question: could you still serve the Domin if you had no tongue?"
